unnormalised: The gig economy presents both opportunities & challenges for HR in India. Onboarding processes need streamlining for short-term contracts. Ensuring compliance w/ labour laws, like EPF, is crucial. Managing diverse skillsets from across India (e.g., a freelancer in Kochi collaborating with someone in Delhi at 17:00 hrs on 26/01/2024) demands robust HR tech. Performance management needs re-thinking beyond traditional KPIs. Consider the impact on long-term workforce planning at IIM Ahmedabad. Upskilling & re-skilling initiatives are vital for sustained employability post 15/08/2023.
